sense.name: to concentrate, focus
sense.examples: The beam focalized on the suspected microcalcification. The project primarily focalized on multimedia rights. The narrator focalized his third-person narration from outside the action. He focalized the attention on heterostructures and superlattices. He focalized his professional interest mostly on the domain of lipoplasty.

sense.name: Sharpen an image, bring into focus
sense.examples: The multimedia projector focalized the image at a short distance. The lens focalizes the image of a painting surface. The Z measurement is performed by focalizing the image of a bubble.
